body: An Ordinary Citizen comments on the volatile share market of Bangladesh from an investor's perspective: "the market follows no logic. The matter seems to become a gamble and some powerful are stage-managing the whole show."
original_body: An Ordinary Citizen comments on the volatile share market of Bangladesh from an investor's perspective: "the market follows no logic. The matter seems to become a gamble and some powerful are stage-managing the whole show."
title: Bangladesh: Crisis In The Share Market
